game.item

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.item.Item
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Describable, Nameable, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HealingItem, Map, PowerUpItem

    public abstract class Item
extends java.lang.Object
implements Nameable, Describable, java.io.Serializable
    An item such as a map, power up or healing item.
    Author:
    jesse

    Serialized Form

      • fromStrings

        public static Item fromStrings(java.lang.String specifier,
                               float scalePrice)
        All items must have Name, Flavour, Price and Type keys. Valid type values are "Healing", "Map" and "PowerUp". Healing items require ApplicationTime, RestorationLevel PowerUp items require Ability, AppliesTo Valid MinigameTypes for AppliesTo are "PaperScissorsRock", "DiceRolls", "GuessTheNumber" and "All".
        Parameters:
        specifier - The item to return.
        scalePrice - Scaling factor to apply to prices
        Returns:
        An item from the Strings file.

      • getEffect

        public java.lang.String getEffect()
        Returns:
        The effect that this item has on gameplay.
